channel.title: Creating my First website
channel.description: How would I create a website with HTML so i can customize myself,I dont want a smfforfree or anything,Maybe a subdomain or my own hosting services? I also want to get it to look like the runescape 2 page. I want to get a website name like this http://thatoneserver.no-ip.org/smf/

item.title: Creating my First website
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

If you host the website from your computer(wamp, xampp, etc.) you can get http://www.no-ip.com, which is pretty much a free subdomain service.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating my First website
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“xX00java00Xx, post:2, topic:169456”]Well making it look like the runeescape page is fairly simple, but there are always the copyright issues. I got in trouble for useing there graphics/pictures so be careful! To get it to look the same you have to first download all the pictures from the runescape homepage, the scroll top, bottom, and middle. The background, the header(logo) the icons for the different menu boxes, etc. To download all these things you have to right click it and press “Save picture as” Now once you got all that go back to the runescape homepage and right click (somewhere in the middle of the page prefferably) and pess “view source” Now this is the code you will need to upload to your websites index. Now that you have this go upload all the pictures and the html code you got from the webssite. Now go into the code and find all the link and replace them with the links you want. There you go you got you homepage looking the same as runescape.

Great place for free froums would be the following:

tapatalk.com

Tapatalk - Mobile First Community Platform - Free forum mobile app, Free forum...

Stay connected with your community on-the-go with this award-winning forum app


tapatalk.com

Tapatalk - Mobile First Community Platform - Free forum mobile app, Free forum...

Stay connected with your community on-the-go with this award-winning forum app

You can see my forums (i used freeforums) to see if it fits your needs: www.rsserverdb.freeforums.org[/quote]
Epic advertisement.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating my First website
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“xX00java00Xx, post:2, topic:169456”]Well making it look like the runeescape page is fairly simple, but there are always the copyright issues. I got in trouble for useing there graphics/pictures so be careful! To get it to look the same you have to first download all the pictures from the runescape homepage, the scroll top, bottom, and middle. The background, the header(logo) the icons for the different menu boxes, etc. To download all these things you have to right click it and press “Save picture as” Now once you got all that go back to the runescape homepage and right click (somewhere in the middle of the page prefferably) and pess “view source” Now this is the code you will need to upload to your websites index. Now that you have this go upload all the pictures and the html code you got from the webssite. Now go into the code and find all the link and replace them with the links you want. There you go you got you homepage looking the same as runescape.

Great place for free froums would be the following:

tapatalk.com

Tapatalk - Mobile First Community Platform - Free forum mobile app, Free forum...

Stay connected with your community on-the-go with this award-winning forum app


tapatalk.com

Tapatalk - Mobile First Community Platform - Free forum mobile app, Free forum...

Stay connected with your community on-the-go with this award-winning forum app

You can see my forums (i used freeforums) to see if it fits your needs: www.rsserverdb.freeforums.org[/quote]

You understand nothing. By copying the main source, you only copy the frame. Nothing there is on your website, you are just providing a frame to view the actual Runescape page. You could delete all the images on your host and nothing would be changed.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating my First website
item.dc:creator: @w00d_returns w00d returns
item.description:
@w00d_returns wrote:

[quote=“xX00java00Xx, post:2, topic:169456”]Well making it look like the runeescape page is fairly simple, but there are always the copyright issues. I got in trouble for useing there graphics/pictures so be careful! To get it to look the same you have to first download all the pictures from the runescape homepage, the scroll top, bottom, and middle. The background, the header(logo) the icons for the different menu boxes, etc. To download all these things you have to right click it and press “Save picture as” Now once you got all that go back to the runescape homepage and right click (somewhere in the middle of the page prefferably) and pess “view source” Now this is the code you will need to upload to your websites index. Now that you have this go upload all the pictures and the html code you got from the webssite. Now go into the code and find all the link and replace them with the links you want. There you go you got you homepage looking the same as runescape.

Great place for free froums would be the following:

Forumer.com
freeforums.org

You can see my forums (i used freeforums) to see if it fits your needs: www.rsserverdb.freeforums.org[/quote]Thanks,But I want a simplier way.[quote=“JV, post:3, topic:169456”]Correct me if I’m wrong, but I don’t think Java read it properly.
I think by saying ''I want to get a website name like this http://thatoneserver.no-ip.org/smf/",
he just means that he wants a subdomain-name. You can find a list of free subdomains somewhere in the Web Design section.

For your first website, I wouldn’t reccommend starting a hosting service, try something a little simpler, perhaps a personal site or something which isn’t too complicated.

-JV[/quote]I am new,But i can catch on.I really want a subdomain of my own and free hosting :d

Read full topic

item.title: Creating my First website
item.dc:creator: @xX00java00Xx xX00java00Xx
item.description:
@xX00java00Xx wrote:

O[quote=“JV, post:3, topic:169456”]Correct me if I’m wrong, but I don’t think Java read it properly.
I think by saying ''I want to get a website name like this http://thatoneserver.no-ip.org/smf/",
he just means that he wants a subdomain-name. You can find a list of free subdomains somewhere in the Web Design section.

For your first website, I wouldn’t reccommend starting a hosting service, try something a little simpler, perhaps a personal site or something which isn’t too complicated.

-JV[/quote],

Oh, ok. Thanks for correcting me. I didn’t quite understand what he said.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating my First website
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

Correct me if I’m wrong, but I don’t think Java read it properly.
I think by saying ''I want to get a website name like this http://thatoneserver.no-ip.org/smf/",
he just means that he wants a subdomain-name. You can find a list of free subdomains somewhere in the Web Design section.

For your first website, I wouldn’t reccommend starting a hosting service, try something a little simpler, perhaps a personal site or something which isn’t too complicated.

-JV

Read full topic

item.title: Creating my First website
item.dc:creator: @xX00java00Xx xX00java00Xx
item.description:
@xX00java00Xx wrote:

Well making it look like the runeescape page is fairly simple, but there are always the copyright issues. I got in trouble for useing there graphics/pictures so be careful! To get it to look the same you have to first download all the pictures from the runescape homepage, the scroll top, bottom, and middle. The background, the header(logo) the icons for the different menu boxes, etc. To download all these things you have to right click it and press “Save picture as” Now once you got all that go back to the runescape homepage and right click (somewhere in the middle of the page prefferably) and pess “view source” Now this is the code you will need to upload to your websites index. Now that you have this go upload all the pictures and the html code you got from the webssite. Now go into the code and find all the link and replace them with the links you want. There you go you got you homepage looking the same as runescape.

Great place for free froums would be the following:

freeforums.org

You can see my forums (i used freeforums) to see if it fits your needs: www.rsserverdb.freeforums.org
